    • connectionAttempt

      public static Connection connectionAttempt()
      readProjectFile method used to read the 'Projects' text-file and add each line to an object ArrayList. This method will return an ArrayList value that can be worked with.
      Returns:
      ArrayList This will return a list of projects read from the Projects text-file.

    • convertToInt

      public static int convertToInt(String str)
      convertToInt method used to convert a string value into an integer. This method will return an integer value that can be used for calculations.
      Parameters:
      str - String needed to convert
      Returns:
      int This will return the converted String.

    • intTest

      public static void intTest(String numToConvert, String type)

      Parameters:
      numToConvert - The number needed to convert.
      type - The type of input needed to print to user.
